column2:
"I might really be stuck this time...
No, I can't give up! I've been doing my best all this time...
Oh, it's you!"

"Please, hear me out! I need to pick a design for the table we're going to use at the event venue...
But I can't think of anything!"
"Everything I come up with is too much like designs we've used in the past! There's no novelty factor! I want an idea that nobody's ever seen before!"
"Having you to help me is really encouraging. If you think of anything I could use as a reference, please let me know!"
